channel.title: Click a stat to change its level [Delta]
channel.description: i need some help, trying to make it so when i click a stat i can change its level to anything i want, for pvp purposes. so when some1 clicks a combat stat in the chatbox you type in what you want it to be, so you dont have to be either maxed combat or just a boring pure, i want to make it interesting, can anyone help?
